lustre/osd-ldiskfs/osd_quota_fmt.h

00023 /*
00024  * Copyright (c) 2012, 2014, Intel Corporation.
00025  * Use is subject to license terms.
00026  *
00027  * Lustre ldiskfs quota format
00028  * from include/linux/quotaio_v2.h
00029  */
00030 #ifndef _OSD_QUOTA_FMT_H
00031 #define _OSD_QUOTA_FMT_H
00032 
00033 #include <linux/types.h>
00034 #include <linux/quota.h>
00035 
00036 /*
00037  * The following structure defines the format of the disk quota file
00038  * (as it appears on disk) - the file is a radix tree whose leaves point
00039  * to blocks of these structures. for the version 2.
00040  */
00041 struct lustre_disk_dqblk_v2 {
00042         __u32 dqb_id;         
00043         __u32 padding;
00044         __u64 dqb_ihardlimit; 
00045         __u64 dqb_isoftlimit; 
00046         __u64 dqb_curinodes;  
00048         __u64 dqb_bhardlimit;
00050         __u64 dqb_bsoftlimit;
00051         __u64 dqb_curspace;   
00052         s64     dqb_btime;      
00053         s64     dqb_itime;      
00054 };
00055 
00056 /* Number of entries in one blocks(14 entries) */
00057 #define LUSTRE_DQSTRINBLK \
00058                 ((LUSTRE_DQBLKSIZE - sizeof(struct lustre_disk_dqdbheader)) \
00059                  / sizeof(struct lustre_disk_dqblk_v2))
00060 #define GETENTRIES(buf) (((char *)buf)+sizeof(struct lustre_disk_dqdbheader))
00061 
00062 /*
00063  * Here are header structures as written on disk and their in-memory copies
00064  */
00065 /* First generic header */
00066 struct lustre_disk_dqheader {
00067         __u32 dqh_magic; /* Magic number identifying file */
00068         __u32 dqh_version; /* File version */
00069 };
00070 
00071 /* Header with type and version specific information */
00072 struct lustre_disk_dqinfo {
00073         /* Time before block soft limit becomes hard limit */
00074         __u32 dqi_bgrace;
00075         /* Time before inode soft limit becomes hard limit */
00076         __u32 dqi_igrace;
00077         /* Flags for quotafile (DQF_*) */
00078         __u32 dqi_flags;
00079         /* Number of blocks in file */
00080         __u32 dqi_blocks;
00081         /* Number of first free block in the list */
00082         __u32 dqi_free_blk;
00083         /* Number of block with at least one free entry */
00084         __u32 dqi_free_entry;
00085 };
00086 
00087 /*
00088  *  Structure of header of block with quota structures. It is padded to
00089  *  16 bytes so there will be space for exactly 21 quota-entries in a block
00090  */
00091 struct lustre_disk_dqdbheader {
00092         __u32 dqdh_next_free; /* Number of next block with free entry */
00093         __u32 dqdh_prev_free; /* Number of previous block with free entry */
00094         __u16 dqdh_entries;   /* Number of valid entries in block */
00095         __u16 dqdh_pad1;
00096         __u32 dqdh_pad2;
00097 };
00098 
00099 /* Offset of info header in file */
00100 #define LUSTRE_DQINFOOFF        sizeof(struct lustre_disk_dqheader)
00101 #define LUSTRE_DQBLKSIZE_BITS   10
00102 /* Size of block with quota structures */
00103 #define LUSTRE_DQBLKSIZE        (1 << LUSTRE_DQBLKSIZE_BITS)
00104 /* Offset of tree in file in blocks */
00105 #define LUSTRE_DQTREEOFF        1
00106 /* Depth of quota tree */
00107 #define LUSTRE_DQTREEDEPTH      4
00108 
00109 #define GETIDINDEX(id, depth)   (((id) >> \
00110                                 ((LUSTRE_DQTREEDEPTH - (depth) - 1) * 8)) & \
00111                                 0xff)
00112 #endif /* osd_quota_fmt.h */
